title: An ETA on Azir and a question?
body:
Do we have an ETA of Azir?
And what was the bug that got him disabled?

replies.body:
3 Nashors, Deathcap, Seraphs, RoA AND {{item:2139}} 

Who builds that way? O.o

> [{quoted}](name=MadKnife IV,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=eOd161oV,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-10T07:59:08.733+0000)
>
> 3 Nashors, Deathcap, Seraphs, RoA AND {{item:2139}} 
> 
> Who builds that way? O.o

Doesn't matter, this is why he was disabled. His additional soldiers are only suppose do to 25% dmg. So 3 soldiers = 150% damage. Right now they were doing 100% each soldier so 3 soldiers was 300% damage.
Ah, that explains it. Thank you :)
AP Ratio of additional  W Soldier stabs were not being reduced to 25% of total damage...

Riot Exgeniar isn't on the balance team, i.e. not a gameplay designer, but a QA that fixes bugs, so I don't think he can speak on behalf of Riot, but he is more than welcome to offer his own personal opinion on Azir.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Exgeniar,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=eOd161oV,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-10T16:26:19.309+0000)
>
> AP Ratio of additional  W Soldier stabs were not being reduced to 25% of total damage...

Are you gonna end up reversing the changes this patch? I've seen at least 4 new bugs come up between his W, Q and auto attacks doing no damage. The only thing wrong before was that annoying Q auto bug and fervor, but this is much much worse in my opinion.
Since he have bugs in every patch, have internally been mentioned to totally recode him?
